name: Catfall
shortContent: When the character falls, they may take an Agility test as a Free Action. Success and each degree of success reduce the meters equal to the characters Agility bonus when determining damage.
content:
Gymnastic ability and natural balance enables the character
to fall great distances without harm. Whenever he falls, the
character may take an Agility Test as a Free Action. Success,
and each additional Degree of Success, reduces the distance
fallen by a number of metres equal to the character’s Agility
Bonus for the purposes of determining Damage from the fall.
